O. Levy
A. Holtzman

Y. Choi
dcterms:description: The NPN-Cooking Dataset consists of 65,816 training, 175 development, and 700 evaluation recipes, with human annotations corresponding to changes in the status and location of the entities throughout the procedure.
dcterms:title: NPN-Cooking Dataset

dcterms:creator: B. Dalvi Mishra
L. Huang
N. Tandon
W.-t. Yih
P. Clark
dcterms:description: The ProPara Dataset consists of 488 human-authored procedures with 81k annotations regarding the changing states (existence and location) of entities in those paragraphs, aimed at predicting such changes.
dcterms:title: ProPara Dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Donatelli
T. Schmidt

F. Zhai

dcterms:description: The ARA Dataset consists of same recipes written by different authors, annotated with 1592 action pairs through crowdsourcing, aimed at aligning actions across recipes.
dcterms:title: Aligned Recipe Actions (ARA) Dataset
